review: I have consulted Dr Sadhna for my Maternity and iam totally blessed that i chose her for my treatment. She is a very experienced doctor and also a amazing person. Iam totally satisfied with my beautiful journey of 9 months which wouldn‚Äôt be possible without her as she stands and help me throughout my delivery, only by her support and guidance i delivered naturally as she was so patient and cooperative handling me which was not easy. Thankyou for everything. I recommend her for any gynaecologist issues. Lots of love to you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ******* ******* ** *** ** *** **** ***** ****** * **** **** She has helped me delivering my 2 kids at Balaji Action Hospital. I must mention, with god‚Äôs grace, i have had normal delivery for both my kids. Dr. Sadhana guided me very well on various pregnancy issues for both childs and also helped me to face mental challlenges. She is always a call away and takes up the urgent issues even on calls. She was with me during labour and i greatly trust her. I thank her for all the advise and bringing my both children in this world :)
reply_text: The journey of your pregnancy was really wonderful. Thank you for such kind words. I am very pleased to have assisted you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
If you are an unmarried woman who believes in reproductive rights and liberty, please do not visit this doctor ** *** ** *** **** ********** ************* * **** **** **** I was diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy and she literally blamed me for being pregnant at such a young age. Legit created a panic situation where if I didn't get operated, I'd die, without actually explaining to me what was actually going on!! *** ******** * **** ** **** ** ******** *** compelled me to talk to my parents..... She literally said that I deserved a slap from my parents for the thing that I did!
